content:
Can you provide a Latex function that classifies an item as either consumable or non-consumable based on its material properties? For instance, what would be the classification of a transparent solid material using this function? Here is some sample Latex code to get you started:
\newcommand{\classifyItem}[1]{%
   % Add code here to classify the material as consumable or non-consumable
   % Return "consumable" or "non-consumable" based on the classification
}
% Example usage:
\classifyItem{transparent solid}
The classification of this item is \classifyItem{transparent solid}.
